title: Roadsense: Weather-Robust Object Detection
description: Developing a weather-resilient object detection pipeline using YOLOv8 and synthetic vision data. Roadsense enhances model robustness across rain, fog, and glare, improving mean average precision in adverse scenarios. The project includes an interactive app for side-by-side inference and benchmarking of tracking and vision-transformer models.

title: Data Science Project: Modelling Refereeing Bias in Soccer
description: Built a reproducible R-based workflow to analyze 25+ years of UEFA Champions League data with over 50 match features. Applied hypothesis testing and regression models to quantify systemic referee bias, uncovering measurable home-team favoritism and visualizing its evolution over time.

title: LexiLearn: Large Text-to-Storybook using Generative AI
description: Created an LLM-powered web application that transforms dense educational texts into illustrated, accessible storybooks. Designed an extensible NLP pipeline with meta-prompting, vocabulary extraction, dyslexia-friendly text formatting, and quiz generation to make learning more engaging for young readers.
